name: Send a new Mitto SMS from new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description:
This template periodically checks for new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet and sends an SMS via Mitto every time a new row is found. 

A sample source spreadsheet can be found [here.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EMDxTGo-2rt9JfHJY9rs_pJUkmm5qbCJWXibArKl9cc/edit#gid=0) You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change this after you set up the template.
